short_summary: RFQ (Request for Quotation) to deliver a 1 year contract for Correctional Service of Canada.
description: Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN), deadline: 2023-01-04, 14:00 CST. Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is soliciting a single supplier to provide services for Elder programming to meet the needs of Indigenous offenders. The following points shall be considered: Request for Quotation, Supplier Profile, Terms and Conditions, Corporate Accounting and Control Unit, and Conflict of Interest The Proposal and its content. IT Suppliers see: www.correctional.ca PLEASE NOTE THE folowing requirement: The ' Customizer Flavor' Rule is applicable to this RFQ. Currency for the tender is in Canadian dollar (CAD).
